notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The authors acknowledge support by the Hungarian National Research, Development, and Innovation Office (contract No. GINOP-2.3.2-15-2016-00052), the "Momentum" program of the Hungarian Academy of Sciences (contract No. LP2019-13/2019 to L.G.N.) and the European Research Council (grant no. 758161 to L.G.N.). Proteomics instrumentation was funded by a competitive Science Foundation Ireland (SFI) Infrastructure award (12/RI/2346 (3)).
